timeline.bodyText:
why is this a separate platform? Systemd isn't a platform, but something which can be installed on multiple different platforms.
I'd probably have a separate inheritance hierarchy for this feature set. It can still be accessible through the platform instance, but it shouldn't be in the same hierarchy.
